I have always just had a single dvd pack. This 3 pack of Johnny Depp movies is fascinating. The first film, Benny & Joon is a nice family movie. Edward Scissorhands is a classic, From Hell is pretty creepy.
Anyways, I enjoyed all the films and I would recommend this set.

I've always really loved Johnny Depp. I originally got this set because it had Edward Scissorhands on it, but after watching the other movies, I loved the set even more. It was definitely well worth the money, and the quality of the DVD's were great. I'm really happy with this purchase.

Great movie I enjoyed watching I think you will enjoy it also. At least I would hope you do I did

My teenage granddaughter and I were discussing how "cute" Johnny Depp is and she was gushing over his most recent pirate role when I mentioned I had been a long-time fan of Depp as he is such an adaptable actor. She couldn't imagine it had been very long since she was convinced Depp was almost her contemporary.  I told her a favorite of mine was his role in "Benny and Joon" and explained a bit of the movie, gushing a little, myself, over the expert physical comedy Depp used. She declared it MUST be lame since I was so-o-o old and didn't know what good comedy was.  So I found this set of films and we had a movie night together. She loved "Benny and Joon" as well as the others and I have achieved a much improved stature.  This set is a great sampling of Depp's range and commitment to the nuances of each role he undertakes.  It came quickly after I ordered it and I have been quite pleased on the whole.
I was looking forward to seeing this one, but again just ok,  Story line was nothing new,  good quality and price

Brand new and very fast shipping. Thank you for the great sale. I will buy again,thank you for everything. AAAA++++.

I recently watched Benny & Joon and found this collection on here.  What could be better than a triple feature collection of Johnny Depp?  Nothing, that's what.  :-)  But, I found this too late.  I just recently went on a rampage through the flea market and ended up buying Edward Scissorhands and From Hell.

Not that I'm really complaining, I mean, either way I would've gotten all of the movies.  But, I guess my point is that this is an amazing deal.

Benny & Joon: A young mentally ill woman (Joon) is living with her brother (Benny) and, through a game of poker, end up being saddled with young Sam (Johnny Depp).  Sam is a strange young man who likes to dress and model after the silent film star Buster Keaton.  Sam and Joon fall in love and the siblings's relationship is tested when word gets out.

Edward Scissorhands: Depp's true break-out role in movies and the first Depp/Burton collaboration.  An inventor who resides in a castle on top of a giant hill is working to create a human being. Before completion, however, the inventor dies and leaves the almost-complete Edward with scissors for hands.  He is discovered by a kind woman who resides in the town below and she takes him back home, to care for him.  He is welcomed, at first, but then things take a turn for the worst.

From Hell: The year is 1888.  The place is London.  And Jack the Ripper is alive and well and going about his infamous buisness.  This movie takes a view of two inspectors from Scotland Yard as they attempt to solve the murder mystery that is still talked about, over 100 years in the future.

Overall, I loved everyone of these movies and I think that if you are a fan of Johnny Depp and don't own at least 2 of these movies, this is something you must buy.

Most Johnny Depp fans will already have most, if not all, of these films already. If, like me, you already own a few of these on videotape, this is an excellent excuse to upgrade to DVD. Contains the classic Tim Burton feature "Edward Scissorhands", the marvelous romantic comedy "Benny & Joon" and the terror-filled dramatization of Alan (Watchmen) Moore's "From Hell". A wide and sweeping selection of Depp's films, showing the breadth of his acting abilities in fantasy, drama and horror.
Nicely packaged and nice selection of Johnny Depp films.  Even though I have each film individually it is still nice to have them in a compact form.
Great price,we loved the movies.

I was looking to buy Edward Scissorhands to show my family, and was happy to find this trio for a good price. ES and Benny and Joon are classics, and it's nice to see Depp so young. From Hell is a bit meandering and not as good as the other two, but, still, the price is good and I'm happy with my purchase.
It's the original movie covers for each dvd inside!! And they're not all on one dvd which is awesome <3
